title: Tiny scaling for mouse and minimap
body: What happened to the game today, on high resolution the mouse and minimap are extremely extremely small, it makes the game unplayable. This use to only happen when alt-tabbing out of the game on high resolution but is now permanent. How can we as players fix this in game, I do not wish to download a third party mouse icon?

replies.body: how is it not supported, i select the screen resolution in game? not to mention high res screens are not that new, this needs dev attention. this started happening today, barring i did not alt+tab, now it is permanent. explain to me how the dev team goes backwards.

If you're using 4K or overly large resolution then you may experience mouse and screen issues, and is not currently supported.  The issue kind of exasperates if you alt+tab.  Your best bet would be to reduce both you monitor and in-game resolutions, and try a windowed fullscreen setting to see if that helps.  Hope that helps!
